website_summaries.verdict: An impressive design by a popular brand. The most versatile model on our list. The best value for your money.
pros: Combines an exceptional list of features in a sturdy design
Comes with interactive toys and converts to a booster seat as baby grows
cons: The tray is a bit awkward to attach, but it's secure once it's in place

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this! She just visited the first time since we got this item. The toys kept her attention and they are easy to remove at feeding time. She's 8 months old and the size of this seems like it would work for a younger child as well as for a booster seat when they get older.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Embrey

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby product purchase I've ever made!! I wish I had bought it sooner. My 5 months old baby loovveesss this seat. She would sit there for a pretty long time (in baby dictionary that is between 15-30 min) and be very amused by the multiple toys on the tray. That means mommy can finish the dishes or has hot meal. The different kind of toy is a great stimulus for my baby to learn and I love the fact that the height is adjustable. I would definitely recommend this booster seat!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra-sierra

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves this booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of bulky high chairs, so we got this to use in place of one. I use it with every meal, and snack times and he loves it! I think the tray instead of snap should be slide on, to protect those delicate fingers but we just keep moving his hands before we snap the tray. The toys we have used only a handful of times, but he loves his little chair high chair and it fits right on one of my chairs so no issues. We also take with us when we Go out.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandparents and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Our infant grandson (9mos) came to visit for Christmas. This was a lifesaver! Now that he is gone, I folded it up and put it in a "bed in a bag" plastic zip bag and put it in the attic. No worries about padding deterioration like the old high chair we had to throw away and storage is much easier. The old high chair was filthy in the attic we had to throw out. I love that this folds small enough to store in a large zipper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmakdw

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best thing we take with us on trips, to restaurants, friends houses, hotels... We love it and it has worked for our baby from 6 months until now 16 months, she's getting board with it but we still bring it because it's cleaner than some of the ones at restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Simonah Herrera

customer_reviews.title: This is a “Must Have” item for a 5 month old.
customer_reviews.text: We use this chair for every meal! My son is 5 months old, he enjoys sitting up at the table and eating. The chair is very easy to clean and move. My little one is still a little small for the chair. I roll up a little receiving blanket and put it around his lower back works perfect. The jungle insert is fun and keeps him occupied while my husband and I eat. The chair is easy to remove, works great at restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Littlest

customer_reviews.title: Cute little feeding seat! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little seat for my little one. Been using it since the age of 7 months. Easy to setup, very easy to clean. Makes feeding an easier task. The add on definitely adds to the fun part. Haven’t used it while traveling though. Very happy with the purchase. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Riddhi Todi

customer_reviews.title: Must have chair!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat at a good price, and great alternative for any parent looking for a high chair. We have a small condo, and just do not have enough room to fit a large stand-alone high chair. We started using this when our daughter was ready for solid foods ~6 months, and she is currently 19 months. She liked the rainforest addition on top of the table for the first 2-3 months, but we stopped using it after 9 months. The rest of the chair is still functional though. This seat is portable, attaches to any dining chair. We have taken this seat to restaurants, grandparents house, and trips. I highly recommend this!! Must have!!
customer_reviews.author: ICCONFETTI

customer_reviews.title: Get one now!!
customer_reviews.text: Every parent should have this for their child!! You don't have to worry about using a gross and sticky used restaurant seat when you go out. It fits in booths or on chairs at tables perfectly!! I am so glad I purchased this. We use it every time we go out to eat. The toys keep my son entertained until our food arrives. I haven't had any troubles yet with the stickers, as I saw some other people have commented on. Get one of these if you don't already have one!! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Gyolai

customer_reviews.title: Best High Chair On The Market
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few must-haves I think every parent needs. We purchased a similar chair for our first child (just a different theme) and two and a half years later she is still using it as a booster seat. These are AMAZING for travel and are what we use instead of $$$ high chairs. Easy to install, easy to clean, VERY portable, adjusts for a child of 4 months all the way through their toddler years and the kids love it. Can't get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This seat is solid, safe and provides the grandson with a good amount of interest. At four months, he's a big boy and this chair is perfect. The tray has three expansions and will continue to grow with him. He loves to touch and grab the figures on the tray, and the colors really attract his attention. The chair folds up and is portable! The straps attach to almost any chair and allows him to see all of the activity going on around the table. Great little chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Not very professional looking.
customer_reviews.text: Our family-daycare provider has a much more diginified "executive desk" for our little one. That one could be some contemporary/Scandinavian design, and it has a clean & sleek, white look. This one is not very imposing at all, and it would be very hard to have a serious negotiation across this desk--the palm tree and swinging monkey would keep anyone from taking our tot very seriously. But for real, this does the trick. It's a fine thing to sit our kiddo in, if a little busy on top. But if this is your goal, I have no reason not to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: margaret bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: The paint on the toys comes right off and the tray is extremely difficult to get on and off. Also it's so low to the baby's back you have to worry about smacked heads.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandma's house.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandbabies to use at Christmas. Was cheaper than a standard high chair and won't take up much room in the basement until it is needed again. A 12 and 14 month old used it and it fit fine. Toys were entertaining and didn't cost much more than one without toys. Strapped onto a standard dining room chair and it stayed in place fine. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: frog

customer_reviews.title: This is seriously one of the best things I've bought
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously one of the best things I've bought. My mom lives in another state and I didn't want to lug another high chair on the plane or buy one there. This attaches to any dinner table so easily. That top part with all the activities is great for when dinner is not quite ready but you want to keep them entertained for a hot second. It easily comes off to reveal the actual table. It's easy to store away too. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this seat is so convenient because we can just sit her right next to us at dinner or the computer and she has her own toys to pl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this product. she is just sitting up on her own. She really loves being upright. this seat is so convenient because we can just sit her right next to us at dinner or the computer and she has her own toys to play with and she is at eye level with us so she really feels like a big girl!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It wipes off easily, has adjustable heights and the tray is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you need in a booster. It wipes off easily, has adjustable heights and the tray is easy to put on and take off. The toy is handy to distract the baby. Travels well, though it does take up a little room.
customer_reviews.author: Aldous H.

customer_reviews.title: My 7 month old love it too
customer_reviews.text: I loooove it !! My 7 month old love it too!! It's perfect and easy to clean, I love the fact that I can take it anywhere, esp out to eat I dont have to worry about the dirty high chairs at restaurants my 7 month old can sit right next to me and play. When it's time to eat the toy tray comes off but no matter how hard he pulls on the toys they all stay in place. The straps are nice and sturdy and easy to adjust. It can also be used as a booster seat you can remove the back support and tray when your little one is ready to eat at the table with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amor4uxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much we bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much we bought 2. Has 3 adjustments for tray placements and for booster seat height. The toy section of the tray pops I'm and out easily and it's a great distraction for meal time prep...actually our little one loves it so much I think it's her favorite toy! The whole a eat is also really easy to clean. Quick wipe up and you're done!and it takes up a lot less space than a high chair. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Traci-Ann Wint

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cute, and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little booster chair. It serves the purpose of safely securing the baby while you feed them. Best for babies that are able to sit up on their own. The activity tray keeps baby busy while you're preparing their food. My granddaughter does great in it. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Sarabia

customer_reviews.title: Grandmother
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME, AWESOME, LOVE IT - from the time the little one can sit up until they don't need a booster chair this is a great item - give as a birthday or baby shower gift. They are the greatest for taking out to restaurants. THey fold up so easily and have a shoulder carrying strap. You know they are clean when you put in a booth and you have a tray for toys. The kids love them. As they get a bit older they can play at hte table while you fiinisb up dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Peg

customer_reviews.title: The toys are great for keeping a little guy (or girl) happy
customer_reviews.text: The seat is incredibly handy! It folds up neatly to make travelling easier. The toys are great for keeping a little guy (or girl) happy. The only negative is that as you wipe it down, the stickers fade a bit. But overall, I'd still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I use it at restaurants, church and the nail salon. It keeps the baby busy and in one place, while I get things done. Light weight and very portable. It comes with four straps, two for the bottom and two for behind the chair securing. It also has a set inside to secure the child in place, in case you don't want to use the top two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Lane

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to clean and quite functional
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair about 6 months ago. It's very easy to clean and quite functional. We use it every day. Our only complaint is that the rainforest is not useful. The driving track is bordered with paper which wears off quickly because of using water to clean the forest insert. Our baby has no interest in playing with the rainforest. We've taken it off and give him small toys. I suggest saving money and purchase the chair without any attachments
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: An excellent supplement or alternative to a full size high chair. It folds down somewhat smaller for transport or storage. It is great for a grandparent's home or smaller apartment, and can be used as a floor chair for children who cannot sit up by themselves yet. The activity tray comes off for feeding, but can keep a child entertained while you are busy in the kitchen. I own 2, and they are very sturdy and the original has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wood

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's physical therapist originally recommended this instead of a Bumbo because the seat is flat and not curved. We used it at home for a long time. Now, we keep it in the car so that we can bring it into restaurants - our kid is particularly susceptible to germs, and I don't even want to think about how infrequently restaurant high chairs are disinfected. It's also great for when we go to friends' houses, since they rarely have a high chair we can use.
customer_reviews.author: shiraleh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this seat! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My parents have a similar seat at their home for their grand kids. I wanted to be able to put our high chair away and have more space in the kitchen once my son was about 18 months. He loves sitting at the table with us. And now he loves to buckle himself in. I also love that I can take this seat with us on vacation as have a "high chair" for my kids without having to lug around the big actual high chair. Haven't used the toy tray yet but I look forward to using it when the next kids comes along. Cleans VERY easily. The buckles are removable to throw in the washing machine. Sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Lucherini

customer_reviews.title: Great for dining out
customer_reviews.text: My son will be 2 soon and this has been a great distraction when dining out and a perfect solution for the germophobe mom who doesn't want their child in those gross high chairs with the nasty buckles that never get cleaned
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat, the toy tray comes off easy but ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat, the toy tray comes off easy but not so easy that my 10 month old can pull it off. She likes the toys and has had the seat for months and still seems interested in them. I was a little worried about the size as my baby has chubby legs but the seat is a nice size. It wipes clean very easily which was the number 1 thing I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien Snyder

customer_reviews.title: We ALL love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our grandson. This booster seat is actually a booster high chair. The toy tray (which is quite entertaining in the baby's opinion) snaps off easily so you can use the food tray underneath. The seat is wide and stable, the chair is light enough to go anywhere. The baby LOVES it as does his parents and his grandparents! In fact, it's loved so much that the nice wooden high chair that his brother used has stayed in storage! Great price, Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny L. Huckaba

customer_reviews.title: adorable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Havent gotten to use this yet ( it is to be a shower gift from my parents) but took it out of the box to make sure it wasn't damaged or had parts missing. Feels sturdy, easy to adjust, and is so cute and vibrant. Looks to be a good purchase. Love that it goes up to fifty pounds so hopefully will get lots of use out of it. Also love that it was less expensive than the highchair and booster combos I was going to put on our registry and those had smaller weight limits and less thigh room.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Love the toy tray
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful. Toy tray keeps my daughter occupied while I'm getting meals ready or doing dishes and everything wipes down easy. Love the height adjustment for different sized tables and how secure you can get the seat on lots of types of chairs. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Functional. Portable. Easy to clean. The removable play top is helpful when you need to entertain the baby while others eat. Sometimes I actually get to eat, too, if she is busy with the toys!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Handa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the price. You can leave the toys on while you’re finishing things up then it easily pops off for meal time. Easy to clean and pop on and off of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: KenjiAnn

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to feed my one year old daughter&11 month old niece for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. They love it! I love it because the toys entertain them while I finish making their food. When it's time to eat they can have a great time picking up food at their leisure. Great high chair and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable PriceNicely Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. We have been using it for about 6 mos. now. It’s holding up very well. Good quality and has safety features I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Travel junky

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gammy House
customer_reviews.text: The seat was a breeze to understand, but the tray was a little difficult to use at first. My grandson came over the next day and we, hIs Mother and I , put him right in to it. I had it situated on the floor for the first trial run and he loved it. Later I took the tray insert out and just used that alone when he wanted to play some more. Very visually stimulating for a seven month old and I'm sure the seat with straps will work just as well for feeding time.
customer_reviews.author: ahlana

customer_reviews.title: Like the play top but a little hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby gift. Like the play top but a little hard to remove, may loosen up as the parents use it more. I have an earlier version without the play top and these boosters are so helpful. Love them, great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily attaches. My cousin brings hers when she travels ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly on our breakfast bar chairs. We can push the chair in as long as the toy isn't in place. Our daughter loves sitting with us. Easily attaches. My cousin brings hers when she travels to our house too.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, easy to assemble. Would have been better with a cushion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing key info
customer_reviews.text: Description should mention it should not be used with a high back chair. A baby will rock back and hit their head on the back of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! A space saver. Wipes up easily. If the straps get yucky they clean right up in the sink and are dry in no time. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nick l.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this chair.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this seat for my 6mo old grandson and he loves it. Doesn't take up toouch space in grandma's house like a traditional highchair would and does the job. When he sits high enough the tray can be removed to be used as a booster seat pulled up to the table. Great product. Very secure when both back and bottom straps are used. And he has a blast with the toy tray.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Product: Easy to assemble. Easy to adjust. Great clips used to buckle baby in and to buckle to a chair. Super clean. Great packaging. Playability: Supercalafrajalisticexpialadocious! My 5 month old absolutely loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nail Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 5 month old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 5 month old. She isn't eating table food yet, but she loves being at the table with us and the toys keep her happy!
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price great chair
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single mom so easy install is important to me as we'll as good pricing. I have two of these seats for two little ones and I love them. They are small which makes it easy to travel with. They are easy to clean plastic. Dirt and food get underneath the chair but if you unstrap and remove you can clean easy enough. It works fine as a booster seat for bigger kids. Great deal great product
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Ok for Grandparents or occasional use
customer_reviews.text: These are really small but for 10 month old infant girls they were comfortable at their Nana's house but poor design on how to secure the trays. Outside of that, I did like how the play insert in the tray would pop out and there was a small tray for them. The tie downs were suspect and not sure if they would not rip or break after awhile but for that occasional visit to Nana's, it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: THE KEL

customer_reviews.title: Compact and portable
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved her booster seat and had something to play with. Toys are very secure and never came apart no matter how much she tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tina J

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair for Grandma's house
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old grandson loves this highchair. He plays with the toys while I make his food and then I remove it while feeding him. You can also hook other toys on using baby rings so the toys don't get thrown on the floor during the 'baby drops, you pickup' stage! I can see this is a great highchair that can be used for years as it also converts to a booster seat. We haven't used it at a restaurant yet, but may try that too.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: The best high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, useful and extremely durable. I used it in the kitchen, dining room at restaurants, my son will be a year old and I'm still using it. I would recommend this product. Only con is the stickers lanes on the play area of the chair come off when you wash it other than that everything is in place. I recommended to my friend and she loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Cute chair, but doesn't seem very comfy. Not great for a baby who is still wobbly while sitting because my little one doesn't have much support and bumps the back of her head on the chair this seat is attached to. I prefer Fisher Price space saver highchair since it's padded, has head support, and has different seat positions. Tray is also much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter when she started foods at 6 months old. After a month of using, it's been good so far
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandma's House
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson's visits or going out to dinner. The toys help entertain him while we finish our meals or while preparing his meals.
customer_reviews.author: Debra W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Just got this for my 8 month old and it's perfect. Completely replaced our high chair which is great considering our limited space. The toy tray 'clicks' in as opposed to some other suction toys we've used. My daughter was able to rip the suction toys right off but this stays in place and she really enjoys playing with it. It's so easy to take to a restaurant and keep her occupied. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nikki b

customer_reviews.title: I love this seat and so does my LO
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat and so does my LO. We bring it with us while dining out and it keeps her entertained while we wait for our food. I prefer this over a conventional highchair or any others of its kind specifically because of the toy that snaps in. Its a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a normal highchair
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this strictly for the toy tray to entertain my son. When he was around 6 months, this worked out great. We dine out a lot so this has helped when we're at restaurants. Fast forward to now, and my son is over a year old. Now we've taken the toy tray out and always keep this in our trunk. It has come in handy so many times. We've pulled it out when we visit friends' houses, the beach, or really anywhere when he needs a snack when we're out. The only thing I wish is that the seat had a cushion, so it was a little more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Year and a half of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson. Have had it about 16 months and he loves it. Can put him in the chair and he plays with the activity center until you can get his food ready. 19 months old and still no fussing. Cleans relatively easy and secures well to dining chair or barstool.
customer_reviews.author: dcminatl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter & my grandson love this seat she said this is a wonderful seat for her baby to grow into
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cloth highchair for $65 and I don't use it at all. This is the best seat you can get. Hose it off, scrub it down.. so easy. I take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lena B.

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our grandson. Easy to set up and so cute. Used for the first time today. He loved the the entertainment insert. Had the chair on the floor and it was very sturdy and will be used for a long time. Perfect for grandparents house and it can travel. Fisher Price did it again - cute and good design.
customer_reviews.author: Silber

customer_reviews.title: ... the other baby gear we have but I'm so glad we bought it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure we needed this with all the other baby gear we have but I'm so glad we bought it. We use is weekly out to dinner and even sometimes around the house because our baby enjoys playing with it so much. People stop us at restaurants all the time and ask where we got it!
customer_reviews.author: MrsThoma

customer_reviews.title: A good booster seat but i am not very happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: A good booster seat but i am not very happy with the straps and safety of the seat Toy table should have music or sounds as well coz my baby just sits there and is not at all entertained by the toys
customer_reviews.author: Awais Maqbool

customer_reviews.title: PSA: CHAIR STYLE DANGEROUS WHEN NEXT TO TABLE
customer_reviews.text: PSA: DO NOT LET YOUR CHILD SIT AT A TABLE OR NEAR ANYTHING STABLE WITH THIS CHAIR!! ... it is safe when the child is eating with a tray AWAY from the table or anything stable he/she can kick off of, but my 11month baby was able to kick the table and tipped the chair straight back hitting his head. He had a concussion and has been throwing up ever since. We are super lucky it wasn't worse. He had a very expensive CT scan that came back negative - thank God!! Doc said it could have been a brain bleed which can cause brain damage or death. So please, please please be careful with this style of chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesi Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever invented for a little tike! Since meal times are sporadic at our house due to all the different work schedules, this come in handy when the baby has already eaten but you want her at the table with the rest of us. The toys keep her occupied and entertained. It is very easy to clean up and is much more portable for going to great grandmas, aunts and various friends who dont have baby gear or small children. Work great in restaurants too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to leave at the baby's grandmother's house. Works great. The toys did not cost much, though it's impossible to feed the baby while the toys are attached. The downside of the toys is you don't get a removable tray or cover, but after my baby eats, the toy is attached and she plays for a while. Very easy to attach to a chair and easy to use overall.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tiplitz

customer_reviews.title: All the moving parts are great, and after he is over the toy part
customer_reviews.text: This chair was suggested by my sons physical therapist to help him sit, while keeping him entertained. He loves it! All the moving parts are great, and after he is over the toy part, it doubles as a portable high chair. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Perfect for Grandma's house....doesn't take up much room, has toys and can be sat on the floor in the play area as well as the kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 14 months old boy didn't like to sit there at the beginning
customer_reviews.text: My 14 months old boy didn't like to sit there at the beginning. But as he gets older, he uses it more now for feeding. It's very nice color and the toys are cool to entertain him while feeding. I am satisfied with this product and will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby LI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for BLW
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height tray for self feeding/BLW. Three tray positions so it fits chunky baby belly and plenty of leg room as well. My son (1yr old) loves the play tray and keeps him occupied while I'm cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: npatterson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect place to feed baby and have them play. Keeps her entertained for a good half hour. Top snaps off for feeding time. She loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Baby booster
customer_reviews.text: More importantly, the baby loves it! Privacy prevents me from posting his picture, but he loved the toys! It restrains him safely. He sat up like a "big boy" for Easter dinner at the table with the adults (7 months old) and we all had a great time laughing at his antics. Mashed potatoes everywhere. =)
customer_reviews.author: saxon54

customer_reviews.title: Love this booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this booster seat. I had to buy two! One at my house and one at my mom's. Entertains her while I cook her food :) Great product!
customer_reviews.author: StephAA

customer_reviews.title: ... the toys (she's 10 months now) and it is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Grandbaby loves playing with the toys (she's 10 months now) and it is easy to clean. The only complaint is that the stickers on the play area are paper not plastic based and are getting washed off. Otherwise very sturdy and attaches well to a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful purchase. My 8 month old granddaughter was visiting ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful purchase. My 8 month old granddaughter was visiting over the holidays and I purchased this booster seat to use instead of a full highchair. It's wonderful - light weight and served the purchase excellently. I would definitely recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little seat!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my son started to sit up on his own, I knew it was time to invest in this seat. It straps to any chair so you can take it pretty much anywhere. The little play jungle pops out to a table for the little ones. This is the second one I'm buying for my boys and I just purchased another for my baby sitter. No need for a high chair once you have this little seat. Perfect if you don't have a huge kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: My3Sons

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a little small, I'm not sure how long we will be able to use it and my baby is just shy of 1 and 20 lbs. He does like the toys. The table top snaps in on the sides with plastic tabs, I find it a little difficult to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for play or feeding!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My son can sit in it and play with the rainforest thing or I can take it off and use this to feed him when we are upstairs away from the high chair. Bought this when my son was 4 or 5 months old and we are still using it!
customer_reviews.author: BKennedy

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: its a nice chair BUT my almost 6 months baby 22 pounds don't fit in it, her tummy presses against the tray. Cute but not for 20 and up pounds or banirs with bellies..
customer_reviews.author: Bilal Fareedzai

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We decided on this over the standard highchair. I love that there is no cloth so it is very easy to keep clean. Plus the "rain forest" is a great distraction for our son while we are getting his food. We will definitely be taking this on our vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Strickland

customer_reviews.title: This seat is amazing. We have been using it since my lo ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat is amazing. We have been using it since my lo could sit up. He loves to play with the toys and that pulls off really easily for him to eat. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hiers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little booster. The only thing I'd like to see is a little cushion to make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We really like this chair. It secures the child in it very well. There's no wiggle room for the little one. It's a good source of entertainment for a few moments prior to feeding start (perfect to calm down a hungry baby for a minute).
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not for my newborn (not reclinable) but perfect for my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: I really love the idea that you can use it at home ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my baby niece.I really love the idea that you can use it at home and carry it along easily as well.Toys are fascinating as well. Some times her mom just let her sit in it even if she is not eating any thing.She sits and play with the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat for feeding.
customer_reviews.text: At first it was kind of awkward because my son couldn't hold himself up good enough not to bang his head on the back of the seat, but now it works fine and the activity part is great to keep him occupied while I make his cereal. Sturdy and reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: JLAMPDAZME

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful little chair. I love the toy tray and the fact the chair has three height positions and three tray positions. It folds down easily and transports very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella2

customer_reviews.title: This booster seat has been amazing! My daughter loves playing with the toys
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat has been amazing! My daughter loves playing with the toys. Now that's she's older she just uses the seat. This has been a life saver when eating out!
customer_reviews.author: MaximBot

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for visiting grandchildren.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our seven month old granddaughter's visit. It worked very well for it was a good size, secured very well to a chair, cleaned up easily, and stores in a small space. We liked the adjustable height and tray feature as it will adjust to the growing child. Since the toy platform was part of it, we used it, but not in the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Royalty

customer_reviews.title: You will love this as I do
customer_reviews.text: You will love this as I do. It is bright and colorful, easy to put together and snap in place, affordable and my grand baby loves it. I can take the play tray off for her to play with when she is not going to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hicks

customer_reviews.title: This has been an excellent buy for us
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent buy for us. Our baby girl has been using this since 6 months and today she is 13 months.. Still very comfortable..initially we used a soft blanket to provide cushion, but now we don't use that. She eats every time at the table with us. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Nupur  Gupta

customer_reviews.title: My daughter liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked it a lot. Bought this when she is 8 months old and still using. Now she is 18 months old. Can be used for one more year.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen K.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandchild. Very durable and worth the price. Reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fisher price booster seat rainforest
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest and most functional booster seat ever! My grandaughter loves the toys on the tray. They keep her entertained while the food is being prepared. It is also easy to take the toys off when it's time to eat! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: vavavavoom

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this little chair its easy to carry and its fun for my great grandson to sit in while playing and watching tv. Anything Fisher-Price is made with quality and I know will be great. Thanks for being so children conscious Fisher-Price, I've been buying Fisher-Price for over 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Keeps my baby entertained for a good while, and sturdy enough to use on the floor--with close supervision, as it's not intended for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and light to carry
customer_reviews.text: I love the toy tray and it easily comes off. Easy to clean and light to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Ayala Mom

customer_reviews.title: Child Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: What a great seat for the money. My 14 month old granddaughter fits perfect, loves the toys (especially the bird). Well packaged, easy to put together, everything snaps into place and stays. Top tray removes for regular tray underneath. Dishwasher safe. Adjustable seating as they grow. Safety straps are secure and safe and comfortable. It just plain looks good and works excellent. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Akers

customer_reviews.title: Grandchild thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Seat is sturdy and the straps make the seat very secure. The toys are easy enough and colorful so that they attract my 4 month old Grandson but will keep him occupied later when he is able to move them totally.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Sprague

customer_reviews.title: I love almost everything about this booster
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this booster. The only complaint I have is that it seems difficult sometimes to get the tray off when baby is done eating/playing.
customer_reviews.author: P31

customer_reviews.title: Nice fun product!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 mo old grandson loves this seat. He needs a tiny bit of support to sit straight but works great! So many cute learning activities on here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Rainforest Healthy Care Booster Seat
product_meta.description: Looking for a way to keep baby entertained while you’re preparing her meal (or when you’re dining out)? The Rainforest Healthy Care Booster Seat has a rainforest full of fun that snaps right onto the feeding tray. Geckos, monkeys and other rainforest friends keep baby busy with lots of action, and the toy snaps right off when it’s time to eat. When baby’s done eating, you can sanitize the tray right in the dishwasher!
feature_bullets: Removable, dishwasher-safe feeding tray with cup holder
Rainforest toy fits onto feeding tray—features tree with 3 spinning bugs, frog and gecko slider beads, bobbling parrot and bead bar with monkey and bananas
Back & tray remove for older child
Front & rear seat straps adjust to fit virtually any chair
The rainforest booster seat is the perfect product to keep baby or toddler entertained at the table while the parent prepares a meal
A fun rainforest toy insert fits into the eating tray for the child to play with
It features a tree with 3 spinning bugs, a colorful bobbling parrot on one side and a monkey swinging from a bead bar vine with bananas on the other
Frog and a gecko slider beads on the base of the item

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars448 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
